Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

::Annihilator/Killer/Zeus/Ares::

Annihilator flies backwards, flipping back over a boulder, and landing 
against another one from Antagony's shot. He gets, rubbing his head and 
growling. Taking out a missile launcher, he fires two rockets at Antagony.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer laughs as he sees Sona go into stasis lock.

"Puny maxi's!!" He yells, turning around to fire at Artist, a shot from 
Artist missing the pred. He raises his comm-link to his mouth.

"Ey Shuko," he yells into it, "Get yo' skid plate bak 'ere, we're woopin' 
maxi's left an' rait!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeus gives a thundering laugh as his enemy crashes through a tree, hearing 
the satisfying crunch of breaking metal. He transforms into robot mode, 
turning and firing a missile at the window Sniper was behind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ares looks on in surprise as his brother easily takes down an enemy. If they 
were so easy to defeat, why had Shuko called a retreat. He jumps into the 
air, transforming into his alternate mode with 15 guns, all of them firing at 
the shields.
